events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn't fit at all, and I would like to request a refund or an exchange for a different size.
The customer's issue has been classified under 'Refund' due to their request for a money back or exchange on the jacket.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah Thompson for further assistance with the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket order. I'm here to help you with the refund or exchange process.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the item has been opened or worn so we can proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 5483921. The jacket has tags still attached and I have not worn it at all.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund once we receive the returned jacket. I will email you the return label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and easy instructions. I appreciate your help with making the refund process smooth.
The return has been processed, and your refund was issued today. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to reflect on your original payment method.
We wanted to check in and ensure that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund was received and no further questions were raised, we are closing this case. Thank you for choosing our service.
